General.Name: Yunnan Yunwei Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Yunnan Yunwei Company Limited engages in the trading of coal, aluminum, steel, and iron ore products in China. Yunnan Yunwei Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Kunming, China.
